Package com.xorprogramming.ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AspectFrame
    A FrameLayout that maintains an aspect ratio while maximizing the parent's space.
    AutoSizeTextView
    A view containing text that automatically sizes to maximize the given space.
    CheckableImageButton
    An ImageButton that adds the ability to be checked or not.
    SquareFrame
    A FrameLayout that maintains a square shape, while maximizing the parent's space.
